pages.text: $(li)Long ago, the Illagers exiled a powerfull wizards who specialized in the ice element and necromancy.$(br)$(li)They, along with their subjects, Strays, live isolated in underground castles in very cold biomes.$(br)$(li)Those wizards are known as the Frostmancers.
$(li)The Ice Castle can be found in the Extreme Hills, Icy and Taiga biomes.
